title: manadu kalangAdE
sahitya:
manadu kalangAdE nI mayilErum perumnai oru nALum maravAdE


anupallavi

  kanavilum tunbamE kaNDiDum pOdilum kandan oruvan uNDu enda vaghaiyilum nI


caraNam    iniyoru vazhiyillai engumE iruL mayam ena eNNi mayangAdE guhanuNDu kalangAdE  
vAzhvilun kurikkOL mangina pOdilum varam taruvAn avan kaliyuga varadan
